name: Kracc's CORE
description:
ATTENTION: This is a short story game, so it's very important that you read all the dialogs to have a better gaming experience.

You wake up with no memories in a burning hospital. You don't even remember your name, but a stranger calls you and guides you out of that place...

Solve the puzzles of each level and discover the story behind the protagonist's memories..

Controls:

Move: Arrows

Interact: Z

Control Time: C

Push boxes: Back Arrow + Z

Credits:

Game developed by: Hollowzera and NobodyLol

Arts by Hertin

Musics by: Bent Langerak

https://bentlangerak.com/

https://soundcloud.com/bent-langerak

GAME DEVELOPED FOR AJAT (A JAM ABOUT TIME)
